rows.label: qst710802_msg0001
rows.name:
Thanks to you, my husband
Anglen has come back!

rows.label: qst710802_msg0003
rows.name:
...is what I was planning to have
him say to you himself, but...

rows.label: qst710802_msg0004
rows.name:
My husband... as soon as he
gave me the fish he caught,
he went off somewhere again.

rows.label: qst710802_msg0005
rows.name:
He probably found a new fishing
spot and couldn't resist.

rows.label: qst710802_msg0006
rows.name:
When he comes back this time, I'll
give him a piece of my mind...!

rows.label: qst710802_msg0007
rows.name: But even though he's like that...

rows.label: qst710802_msg0008
rows.name:
He's irreplaceable to me.
Thank you so much...

rows.label: qst710801_msg0101
rows.name:
My husband once mentioned he
wanted to try and catch a big
one at Coolley Lake in Gula.

rows.label: qst710801_msg0102
rows.name:
I can't believe it, but maybe he
thought the emergency was a good
excuse to go all the way to Gula...

rows.label: qst710801_msg0103
rows.name:
...If he's really just
leisurely fishing, please
give him a slap for me.
